description: Listed only by Irwin in a list of stops under the heading �Minor Flue Chorus�, with no definition.
examplesDescription: All known examples are listed below.

examples.name: Obertone VI 5-1/3', Pedalwerk; Liebfrauendom, Munich, Germany; Zeilhuber 1957.

Oberton III, Brustwerk; Dom, Trier, Germany; Klais 1974.
